description.value:
This curse affects anyone who wears a graveknight's armor for at least 1 hour.

Saving Throw @Check[type:will|dc:] save

Onset 1 hour

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed]{Doomed 1} and cannot remove the armor (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed]{Doomed 2}, the creature's Speed is reduced by 10, and cannot remove the armor (1 day)

Stage 3 dies and transforms into the armor's graveknight.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.Effect: Graveknight's Curse]
